arts.ttl: Return hero: Goretzka scores late in Germany win
arts.sum: In his first appearance for Germany in 16 months, Leon Goretzka delivered a decisive goal against Italy on Thursday in the first leg of the UEFA Nations League quarterfinals.

arts.ttl: Arsenal handed Riccardo Calafiori injury concern as Luciano Spalletti provides update
arts.sum: Arsenal are left sweating over the fitness of Riccardo Calafiori, who was withdrawn in the closing stages of Italy's 2-1 defeat against Germany in the UEFA Nations League.

arts.ttl: Nations League: Merino saves Spain in Netherlands, Germany roar back at Italy
arts.sum: Arsenal’s makeshift striker on target again in 2-2 draw Goretzka gives Germans the edge in quarter-final Spain snatched a stoppage-time equaliser against the 10 men of the Netherlands to secure a 2-2 draw on Thursday that kept up a two-year unbeaten streak and gave the holders the advantage in their Nations League quarter-final tie. Substitute Mikel Merino, a makeshift striker at club level for Arsenal, proved his ability in front of goal for his country too with a close-range finish three minutes into added time. arts.ttl: Goretzka jubilant after comeback against Italy: "It feels nice to be back"
arts.sum: The 30-year-old beamed with delight having made his return to to DFB-Team setup and 2-1 win over the Azzurri.

arts.ttl: "Happy with the win and the performance" - Kimmich reflects on victory in Milan
arts.sum: Die Mannschaft's skipper expressed his happiness after Germany defeated Italy 2-1 this evening.
